summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Government Performance and Financial Management Committee of the Dallas City Council will convene on October 22, 2024, at 1:00 PM in the Council Briefing Room, 6th Floor, City Hall. The meeting aims to discuss various financial management topics and performance reviews pertinent to city operations.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of the September 23, 2024, meeting minutes.
2. Annual review of the City’s Investment Policy.
3. Update on the Talent Acquisition Audit.
4. Review of city real estate for development and updates on the Family Gateway property repair.
5. Overview of the City’s Financial Management Performance Review Criteria and proposed revisions.
6. FY 2024-25 Debt Issuance Overview.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals include the annual review of the investment policy and updates on the Talent Acquisition Audit, which may influence future hiring strategies. The committee will also consider options for the lease of the Bullington truck terminal and assess the condition and repairs needed for the Family Gateway property. Additionally, revisions to financial management performance criteria are on the agenda, reflecting ongoing improvements in city financial practices.

**Action Items**:  
The committee seeks approval of the meeting minutes and decisions on the proposed revisions to the investment policy and financial management criteria. Updates on audits and real estate considerations will guide future actions and budget allocations. The meeting will be accessible to the public both in-person and virtually, ensuring transparency and community engagement.
